name: 王多柏
objective: Analysis and design of electronic circuit including various kinds of amplifier topologies
schedule:
Topics:
Single-Stage Integrated-Circuit Amplifiers.
Differential and Multistage Amplifier.
BJT and FET Frequency Response.  
Feedback and Oscillator Circuits.
scorePolicy:
Homework: 30%
Midterm: 30%
Final Exam: 30%
In-Class performance: 10%
materials:
Textbook: 
1. Microelectronic Circuits, Fifth edition. Sedra/Smith.
2. Electronic Devices and Circuit Theory, Tenth Edition. Boylestad Nashelsky (東華書局代理)
